blocks.name: amgmwlem

} = {

  jca(w0, wcel(c1, crp), wcel(c3, crp))
  ofs2(c0, crp, c2, c1, crp, c3, cmul)
  syl3anc(w0, wceq(co(ccnfld, cgsu, cs2(co(c0, cmul, c1), co(c2, cmul, c3))), co(co(c0, cmul, c1), caddc, co(c2, cmul, c3))), wcel(ccnfld, cmnd), wcel(co(c0, cmul, c1), cc), wcel(co(c2, cmul, c3), cc))
